hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Jabu Jabu's Belly# hoards #a Recovery Heart#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that beyond the #river in the Water Temple# waits #an Ice Trap#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Weird Egg# can be found in #Hyrule Field#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Gerudo Valley# is on the way of the hero.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #inside Ganon's Castle# is a foolish choice.

GC (Maze).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Shadow Temple#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found at #Hyrule Castle#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that plundering #the Gerudo Training Ground# is a foolish choice.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# hoards #Arrows (30 pieces)#.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Front Left Fake Wall Chest

HC (Malon).text: They say that a chest in the #central pillar of Water Temple# contains #an Ice Trap#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: What do you call a group of Gorons?^${12 39 C7}A rock band.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #Ganon's Tower# is protected by a powerful barrier.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: Hi! I'm currently on an exchange program from Termina.^They say that East Clock Town is on the way of the hero.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that deep in #Dodongo's Cavern a pair of scrubs# sell...^ #an Ice Trap# and #an Ice Trap#.
hinted_locations: Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Left
Dodongos Cavern Deku Scrub Near Bomb Bag Right

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #the Keaton Mask# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #the Desert Colossus# is on the path to #the Tower#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that plundering #the Lost Woods# is a foolish choice.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Epona's Song# can be found at #Gerudo's Fortress#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Blue Rupee#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #the Bottom of the Well# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Bottom of the Well Map Chest

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that ##Kokiri Forest## has #4# major items.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that a #fractured desert wall# hides the #Goron Shop#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

SFM (Saria).text: They say that the #rainbow bridge# leads to #the Gerudo Training Ground#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #fountain wall# hides a #Great Fairy Fountain#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that ##Zora's Fountain## has #0# major items.

ToT (Right).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that ##Gerudo's Fortress## has #1# major item.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #the Ice Cavern# is on the path to #King Dodongo#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that ##Hyrule Castle## has #1# major item.

ZF (Jabu).text: They say that in the #Sacred Forest Meadow#, Sheik teaches #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that slaying #100 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that past a #silver block in the Spirit Temple# a melody and boulders conceal...^ #a Small Key# and #the Gerudo Mask#.
